attributes.title: Third Eye Power: The Ability to Will
attributes.description: In this short video, taken from the discourse ‘The Power of Will’ (http://bit.ly/2aJAdLx), Paramahamsa Nithyananda explains about the Ability to Will. Ajna chakra, the third eye or brow center, is the seat of our will. And our will is our spiritual umbilical cord, our connection to the cosmos. It is through our will that we manifest our reality, and that we manifest the spiritual powers of Sadashiva.
